content:
https://github.com/leanprover-community/lean4-metaprogramming-book/tree/master

Links to all chapters / solutions are currently broken, as there are no md files in /md.

Whoops, I definitely realized that would be the case while merging the last PR but I guess I forgot to hit send on the comment.

For what it's worth, thanks to @Asei Inoue's great work, the Markdown is now readable at https://leanprover-community.github.io/lean4-metaprogramming-book/ -- but yeah we'll fix the links, thanks for reporting.
Thank you for reporting an issue. I have created an issue: https://github.com/leanprover-community/lean4-metaprogramming-book/issues/128
Asei Inoue has marked this topic as resolved.
